content:
Interested in what IHE is doing with FHIR? checkout the webinar (with @Jose Costa Teixeira ) next week during the eHealth Plugathon, a side event next to the IHE European Connectathon which is online instead of beeing in Brussel. Any participants there, happy to discuss topics in the #ihe stream (disclaimer: i participate as a monitor there)

Latest update on #IHE profiles on #HL7 #FHIR: online session on Nov 3 at noon CET with @CharlesParisot and @JuBrandstaetter, @Jose_CostaT @IHE_Europe https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/416474524187684623 Join us! #Interoperability #standardisation

- HL7 Belgium (@HL7Belgium)
